text: Nemuteeme Abana abafwilwa ukhula shinga boola ulubaka lwokhuteshia. Nenimubanyoola mbu nabachesi, mubahelesie omwandu kwabu. Ne mulakulia mayuyukhana nohomba mayungubala tawe shichila betsa okhuba Abandu abakhongo. Ne ulia uli omuyinda yeyikalile- okhulia omwandu oko- ne omumanani alie khushichelo shielilako lilaka. Ne nimubahelesia omwandu kwabu mureo abaloli, Ne Nyasaye ayela okhuba omubali
